articles.author: Nette Nöstlinger
articles.title: Magdeburg attack fuels disinformation and mistrust in German leaders - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Ahead of the February election, governing politicians are under fire over security failures while the far right is attempting to capitalize.
articles.content:
Federal authorities are turning over every stone, said German Interior Minister Nancy Faeser of the Social Democratic Party (SPD).
But its far from clear that will reassure voters, particularly as r… [+1647 chars]
